title: Super Bowl LVI Recap
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Ben recap how the Los Angeles Rams won the Super Bowl. They pick out who the biggest winners and losers are, discuss what the future looks like for the Rams and Bengals, and more.

Hosts: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Benjamin Solak
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
